faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: What does mulching include?
items.answer: Usually bed tidy/prep, weeding where needed, neat edges, and an even mulch finish. We’ll confirm scope when we quote.

items.question: When is the best time to mulch?
items.answer: Often spring or autumn, but it depends on your garden and what you want to achieve. We can advise.

items.question: Do you remove waste?
items.answer: Yes—waste removal can be included. Tell us what you want taken away when requesting a quote.

items.question: Do you supply the mulch?
items.answer: We can. Tell us the look you want and we’ll recommend an option and include it in the quote.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.

finalCta.title: Want beds that look finished and stay tidy?
